title: Romphaiopheros = the sword-bearer. Or, The Byshop of Chichester's armes emblazoned in a sermon preached at a synod by T.V. B. of D. sometimes fellow of Queenes Colledge in Oxford, and now pastor of the church at Cockfield in Southsex.
author: Vicars, Thomas, d. 1638.
publisher: Printed by B[ernard] A[lsop] and T. Favvcet, for R. Milburne, and are to be sold at the great south-doore of Pauls,
notes: Dedication signed: Thom: รก Vicars.
First word of title in Greek characters.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
